channel.title: Stats being raised...?
channel.description:
I was watching my brother dungeoneering. He had just gotten 98 attack so he wanted to have a primal 2h so he could use it when he had 99 attack.
Well he got the primal 2h, and for fun tried to equip it. When he clicked on it it said:
"You need to have an attack level of 99 [b]or higher[/b] to wield this item"
Or higher?
Discuss.
(and to you haters or flamers, I'm not saying it will happen, just what do you think?)

item.title: Stats being raised...?
item.dc:creator: @Ethans_308 Ethans 308
item.description:
@Ethans_308 wrote:

The only skill able to go past 99 right now is Dung.

Read full topic

item.title: Stats being raised...?
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

Andrew Ferguson:

Attack potions.

But the raised attack has no meaning other than you’ll be more accurate? If I was 39 attack and drank an attack potion which increased it to 4x, I still wouldn’t be able to wield rune weapons, right?

Read full topic

item.title: Stats being raised...?
item.dc:creator: @reyx7 reyx7
item.description:
@reyx7 wrote:

Back ages ago, sometime around when the tzhaar place first got released, I had just enough money to buy an obby maul. I only had 56 strength, thus I could not wield it. I spent all my cash on one, used a str pot, and couldn’t equipt it. They dropped and I lost some 250k, which made me sad.

Read full topic

There not raising current stats over 99, they stated this when dung came out lol.

[/quote]

Hopefully you don’t notice one of there other crazy features too like you can’t ovl unless your at 510 Con I believe. I kid I kid <3[/quote]

And to teh haters and ragers and trollers and what nots, I’m bot saying it will be raised, I’m not saying i want it raised, i jsut wanna see whut ppl thinkerrs
